definition: to work high above the ground
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: It is widely used for aerial work platform lifting equipment.
sentences.chinese: 是用途广泛的高空作业台升降设备。

sentences.english: This procedure deals with working at heights and rope access.
sentences.chinese: 本程序主要讲述高空作业和绳索的使用。

sentences.english: Working at heights can create additional tool hazards.
sentences.chinese: 高空作业会产生其他的工具危险。

sentences.english: Scissor lift is the extensive use of special equipment for high-altitude operation.
sentences.chinese: 剪叉式升降机是用途广泛的高空作业专用设备。

sentences.english: Whatever happened, we work high above the ground like a spider.
sentences.chinese: 无论高难险阻，我们的高空作业“蜘蛛人”一马平川。

sentences.english: Application of the sensor in leveling work platform of aerial equipment is depicted.
sentences.chinese: 最后说明在高空作业车作业平台调平中的应用情况。

sentences.english: A design scheme of the extracting core worktable of high-altitude working vehicle for heat exchanger was advanced.
sentences.chinese: 提出了换热器抽芯高空作业车抽芯工作台的设计方案。

sentences.english: A brief description is given to the basic contents of the general de-sign of a portable-type high altitude working platform.
sentences.chinese: 简述了轻便型高空作业平台总体设计的基本内容。

sentences.english: Life jacket must be worn when working outboard or overhead.
sentences.chinese: 舷外或高空作业要穿救生衣。

sentences.english: You have to have nerves of steel to be a steeplejack.
sentences.chinese: 你要勇敢些，才能去当一名高空作业修建工。

sentences.english: It makes the operation more efficient, more safety.
sentences.chinese: 它使高空作业效率更高，更安全。

sentences.english: The lift and car battery supporting converted special equipment for high-altitude operation.
sentences.chinese: 由升降机和电瓶车配套改装而成的高空作业专用设备。

sentences.english: One-person setup and operation allows versatile use by one or two people.
sentences.chinese: 适合单人或双人的高空作业。

sentences.english: Life jacket must he worn when working outboard or overhead.
sentences.chinese: 舷外或高空作业要穿救生衣。

sentences.english: Thunderstorm season construction, high above the ground to prevent lightning strikes.
sentences.chinese: 雷雨季节施工，高空作业要防雷击。

sentences.english: Aerial vehicle is a small lifting appliances.
sentences.chinese: 高空作业车是一种小型起重机械。

definition: to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
